actions.in_committee: House Committee on Ways and Means

official_title: To suspend until January 1, 1997, the duty on certain chemicals.

summary.text: Amends the Harmonized Tariff Schedule of the United States to suspend, through December 31, 1996, the duty on: (1) halofuginone hydrobromide; (2) ethyl 2-(4-((6-chloro-2-benzoxazolyl) oxy)phenoxy) propanoate (fenoxapropethyl); and (3) methyl 5-(phenylthio)-2-benzimidazole carbamate (fenbendazole).

titles.title: To suspend until January 1, 1997, the duty on certain chemicals.
